metadata.title: CVE-2023-26159 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Versions of the package follow-redirects before 1.15.4 are vulnerable toImproper Input Validation due to the improper handling of URLs by theurl.parse() function. When new URL() throws an error, it can be manipulatedto misinterpret the hostname. An attacker could exploit this weakness toredirect traffic to a malicious site, potentially leading to informationdisclosure, phishing attacks, or other security breaches.

criterions.comment: node-follow-redirects: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
